item.title: Install Nginx Proxy Manager on Raspberry Pi 3B
item.description: Nginx Proxy Manager acts as a reverse proxy while exposing the services to the network. Using a reverse proxy is good move to improve security and performance. A reverse proxy is a server that sits in front of your apps and forward client requests to the apps. In other words, we will have to expose one server (Reverse Proxy server) using ports 80 or 443 and we will be able to expose any number of apps that we need.
